price: Sai waɗansu 'yan bãya* suka maye a bãyansu suka tõzarta salla, kuma suka bi sha'awõwinsu. To, da sannu zã su hau da wani sharri.
arabic: ۞ فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ خَلۡفٌ أَضَاعُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَلۡقَوۡنَ غَيًّا
footnotes: * An ruwaito cewa wannan zai auku a lõkacin Tãshin Ƙiyãma ne a bãyan tafiyar sãlihan wannan al'umma ta Muhammadu. Zã su dinga barbarar jũnansu a cikin hanyõyi. Su tõzarta salla, su gina manyan gidãje su hau dukan abin da aka hana su, su tufanci abin da aka hana su, Ƙurɗabi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fakhalafa min baʿdihim khalfun aḍāʿū al-ṣalata wa-ittabaʿū al-shahawāti fasawfa yalqawna ghayyan
